website_summaries.verdict: The Olympus Stylus XZ-2 iHS is an excellent bright lens enthusiast compact. At this point, though, you should skip it at its full $600 price.
pros: The Olympus Stylus XZ-2 iHS features a great f1.8-2.5 lens, excellent photo quality and shooting options, and a well-designed body that's solidly constructed
cons: Its high ISO images are noisy
With no built-in Wi-Fi, getting wireless features will cost you extra
Battery charges in camera via proprietary USB cable

website_summaries.verdict: The Olympus XZ-2 has a bright lens and captures sharp photos, but it's too expensive and photos start to show some noise as you notch up the ISO.

customer_reviews.title: A camera to smile about
customer_reviews.text: Truly gives wonderful, lifelike color and detail in images - that is the stellar thing and particularly compared to other cameras in the range. It also is comprehensive in degrees of automatic and manual features. The flip-up/down viewfinder will surprise in its usefulness. Summary: I bought it for a professional use, very carefully researched, and found it gave a big smile.
customer_reviews.author: Roald Olos

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry and competent camera
customer_reviews.text: when purchased on sale for less than $200 at Amazon -- good value. it does decent photos & video. I'll carry it about when not feeling like lugging DSRL with me. Or when DSLR has long tele-focal lens on it, I carry this for wide angle capture. I like figuring out how to get it to work and am having to read the manual a bit. Usually, I just put it in aperture priority & allow camera adjust shutter speed & ISO. There was one thing that "tricked me" for a while is when I accidentally turned the auto-focus off by moving the switch on the lower, front of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: P. Swims (a lot)

customer_reviews.title: This camera has been an awesome upgrade form the cannon g12
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for christmas as our 1 year old was starting to walk. Those are some of the most important moments for us to capture. This camera has been an awesome upgrade form the cannon g12. It's extremely fast at tracking and focusing which is perfect for when the little ones are running around. Video looks great and i like the idea of charging the battery from within the camera. That way you don't end up forgetting the charger dock (which i always seem to do). Great Camera Great Price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Vouniozos

customer_reviews.title: Everything I could have hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: This little gem was recommended to me by my professional photographer father as my next camera. It did not disappoint. I have not even begun to use all of the many features, and I am thrilled with the quality of the photos I am capturing. The ONLY problem I have is that on a sunny day, it is difficult to see the screen. The optional viewfinder would cost as much as the camera itself. Outside of that, I could not have asked for more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for times I want to leave my DSLR at home.
customer_reviews.text: I finally got out and snapped some photos with this little camera. It's bigger than some point and shoot models, but I got it because of the fantastic features and manual controls I can enable, should I decide to shoot manual. I got some great photos. I used it on a tripod with no problems. Navigating the controls is pretty straight forward. I still need to become familiar with many of the settings but out of the gate I am quite happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: excellent price if you do not add lenses
customer_reviews.text: I was able to purchase this on sale. You have to know what you are looking for. I had been interested in the canon g15 and g16, but they are both over priced. This also has a 1.8 lens, so I'm very happy. It is expensive to add lenses, as the lens does not screw out. The added lens with adapter are about $130-170 which is high for an added lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I love this little camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. Great picture quality: takes focused, color accuracy and contrast. Not to light, but not heavy. I find I no longer need to take my Nikon DSL with my on family trips and get togethers.
customer_reviews.author: 196 Wingsneck

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera. I was looking for a do it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera. I was looking for a do it all, point and shoot, but with a few more complex options when the situation arises. This camera went all over the country with me on a 4000 mile motorcycle trip, I am so glad I picked the camera up. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Grant B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth what I paid!
customer_reviews.text: I've just started photography so I don't know how this compares to non camera phone cameras, I have been amazed at the detail at a distance, it's nice and sharp and also I like that I can connect it to my portable battery pack and have a stupidly long battery life while taking photos! 5/5 would buy again and would buy for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Remy Black

customer_reviews.title: It takes great photos. Internal memory is very limited especially with ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been looking a newer cameras but couldn't justify the cost of a DSLR. I kept my eyes on this one so when Amazon put it on sale I bought it for her as a gift. It takes great photos. Internal memory is very limited especially with HD photos, but nothing a high capacity SD card can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: but fits nicely on a pant pocket
customer_reviews.text: This is not a shirt pocket camera, but fits nicely on a pant pocket. Very good start up time. Pictures are sharp and has a very good noise performance up to ISO 800. The articulated screen is sharp and clear and it can touch focus and shoot. The control ring around the lens is really convenience. It has a hot shoe. Not many point and shoot these days has it. This list price is a bit high. But I paid $300 for mine for the 2nd reminding camera in stock at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Larry

customer_reviews.title: Complicated Camera
customer_reviews.text: Complicated little camera. Works well once software was updated, but still complicated. Not sure about machines that are smarter than they need to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's all about lens!
customer_reviews.text: I did use the camera for a while, and what I am still missing is its lens - incredible quality. I do believe the glass is better than that one of LX7, with which those two often compared. I wish Olympus would make an update of this camera, with more megapixels and bigger sensor, retaining same quality of the lens. WEll, some more video capability would not hurt, either.
customer_reviews.author: random_hexamer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I choose this camera over lugging around my dSLR and have been continuously impressed with the immense range of settings. The lens is super bright. I'm so used to needing a flash for certain low light situations. The xz-2 simply doesn't need it. I got a really good deal on this camera. It is worth more than I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas R Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good deal of the day
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about poor focus in low light were right on. However, it does take great pictures otherwise. Will take me a long time to figure out all the bells and whistles. I was really glad to get it at an amazing discount, as I don't think it is worth the original price.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: And it's also true that the manual (which is not included as a hard copy) is not all that great at explaining those menus
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo many options. It's true what they say about Olympus menus (convoluted and obtuse). And it's also true that the manual (which is not included as a hard copy) is not all that great at explaining those menus. Very nice photos, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mattersburger

customer_reviews.title: This is a much better than average macro camera
customer_reviews.text: Most of my photos are done in Macro for eBay. This is a much better than average macro camera. Love the manual white balance which gives me the most accurate colors of all the cameras I have owned. The LCD screen is also accurate and sharp. Wish it was smaller for my small hands but I won't be traveling with it. This is the first camera that can photograph a Tanzanite crystal accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Annie NH

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed......
customer_reviews.text: Have had this camera for 32 days, locks up for no apparent reason? Power button flashes but camera will not turn off must remove battery to "reset". Purchased for my little one's Bday party, had to remove battery at least twice at event, very disappointing. Quality of photographs is fantastic, ease of use terrific, one issue sucks the fun right out of this camera. Impossible to rely on camera with such a malfunction during use. 2 days too late to return to Amazon for exchange :-( If you purchase, use the camera as soon as you receive it so you are not stuck with it in the event of the locking up issue.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaFun

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the fast aperture from wide angle to telephoto
customer_reviews.text: This camera is quite versatile. There are many features on it that make it a pleasure to use. I especially like the fast aperture from wide angle to telephoto. The quality of the pictures is good too, but one really needs to keep the iso ideally under iso 800. The touch screen comes in handy for quick focus point change and reviewing photos. All in all a nice point and shoot camera with plenty of manual features that keep me using it.
customer_reviews.author: Raptor 59

customer_reviews.title: this is the best camera bargain you will ever see
customer_reviews.text: At this price, this is the best camera bargain you will ever see. It is not a simple point & shoot, and will take some time to learn what it is capable of doing. Good build quality & many features.
customer_reviews.author: petee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Was an excellent value at about 50% off the original price. Camera focuses quickly, has all the controls an advanced amateur wants, and takes excellent quality pictures. Beats lugging along DSLR and lenses on hiking trips.
customer_reviews.author: etp3

customer_reviews.title: I like the many features built in so that many effects ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the many features built in so that many effects can be done with the camera itself. But for versatility, I still think a DSLR is better with the size of the XZ-2 not really a pocket size.
customer_reviews.author: Discover888

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: All the camera I need, very well built, compact, fast lens, plenty of scene and art filters, more features than I'll probably ever use... and a great price from Amazon. The only thing I would have liked was a little longer zoom. I don't understand the people who give one or two stars...some people just like to complain.
customer_reviews.author: GJB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I own a childcare and this camera is wonderful for taking candid pix of children. The other camera I owned was so slow this one is not! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Carner

customer_reviews.title: Great camera in low-light
customer_reviews.text: Great camera in low-light, but you may have to use manual focus in some situations. Zoom is limited compared to other compact size, but the camera is solid and well built.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Photoe
customer_reviews.text: You can do better for less money. I ended up buying a different camera for main use but keeping this one for extreme emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: B.E. Goode

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with lots of features in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Takes great shots and is easier to tote around than our Rebel. We took this one to Disney with us and it did a great job! We even had a little fun with the preset features. Disney is about the details, and this camera captured them ;)
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: pretty good bargain
customer_reviews.text: got it for $197, pretty good bargain! fast AF, a little big compared to the sony rx100, a very capable overall camera.
customer_reviews.author: Angeles

customer_reviews.title: So so - not intuitive
customer_reviews.text: The Camera does ok "out of the box" except the software on it can get confused and get stuck in a state where it is inoperable and neither on nor off. The only way out of that problem is to take the battery out and put it back in again. It can also get stuck in a "zoomed in" mode on the viewfinder. I guess the bottom line is that you need to spend time reading the manual before you can really use this camera because it is not intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: SamuraiJack42

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I read about these negative reviews other than to think they are industry hatched. This camera has been splendid to use. The touchscreen has been cool. The camera reaction fast. I love the fast lens on this thing. My god, evening, morning, night, a great bright lens. Concluding, this is the best camera in the category as far as I can tell. Love it! and for so many more reasons.. CDW
customer_reviews.author: chris d williamsTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Now that the camera is heavily discounted, it is a very good buy because of its fast aperture lens, features and available manual controls. FN2 button works great. The camera feels solid and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jose V Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality camera
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality camera. Photos as good as if not better than my DSLR. First camera that records exactly the color and sharpness as my eye sees. Very pleased with Olympus quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Pope

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera. Good size and incredible low-light operations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Good size and incredible low-light operations. It would be nice if it had a longer zoom and wifi but the XZ-2 easily out performs much higher priced cameras I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Greeene

customer_reviews.title: Great camera purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Getting back into "serious enthusiast" photography. Read review on photography web site for this particular camera. Found that you can spend thousands for some fancy stuff you probably never use . . . This purchase through Amazon was incredible. Camera is currently discontinued . . . but still available as new from sources. This brand is well known for compactness and extremely high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday carry
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera on sale. It was affordable enough to keep in my pocket at all times. It is a little bulky, but I'd rather carry out around in my pocket than my Hasselblad Stellar. I would say the price/convenience/iq are a great balance if you can get this under 200 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: The Captain

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I had read many positive reviews and it is everything I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Steele

customer_reviews.title: works great for low light photography
customer_reviews.text: This is my second XZ-2...works great for low light photography.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and video camera. Sharp lens takes quality shots.
customer_reviews.author: Gene M Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As what I have expected.. Got it for a steal... Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Devil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build, camera very versatile once you master all the options
customer_reviews.author: jackcomp

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Great camera! All you could ask for and more.
customer_reviews.author: CEvans

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Found a camera that my mom likes! Takes great looking photos in all types of indoor and outdoor environments and is not fussy about focusing or light metering. I strongly recommend this camera to those who want a relatively compact camera that can match the quality of many digital SLRs.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Desch

customer_reviews.title: very good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: my daughter in law loves since her old camera broke
customer_reviews.author: Irene Dansby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality point and shoot, feature packed high speed lens.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cusse

customer_reviews.title: it would be pretty near perfect (but then it would cost a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: If this was a 16g camera, not 12, it would be pretty near perfect (but then it would cost a lot more). I bought it as a backup for my OM-D EM10, but my wife took one look, and decided it would make a nice upgrade for her old Canon pos. Fine with me. The set-up can take some menu-digging (I like that sort of fiddly stuff), but then it's plain sailing. I set it on iAuto or P, and my wife is off to the races. Very nice build - solid and feels nice in the hand. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: gabe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but was too big for me, I bought the Sony rx 100 m3
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera for the amateur and perfect for a Pro's point and shoot with every option.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Warkenthien

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this camera, and don't use it nearly as much as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kaylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good IQ for the sensor size and excellent features. I have the Ricoh GR and bought this for my girlfriend so that she could have a "smallish" camera with RAW and manual controls. Fits the need well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Turney

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good feeling camera
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a big 35mm guy using a cannon F1 SLR for years. Compared the xz to todays SLR's that were considerably higher in cost and lots of bells and whistles that did not know if I would use. This is a very good feeling camera, with a very high quality feel and appearance. Feel very comfortable with my decision and later after becoming familiar with digital photography I need a camera where I can have wide arrange of lenses I'll buy that 2500 dollar camera. Last but not least Olympus has put to gather a very user friendly manual the best in high tech items of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: jjg

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my liking
customer_reviews.text: Performed VERY well, but returned it because it was too small for my hands - which are not ogre sized. Male with medium sized hands as far as gloves go. If I put a flash unit on the shoe, I couldn't hold it without pressing delete, macro and other buttons on the bottom rt rear of the camera. I bought a Nikon p7800 and it is a much better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far it looks like the pictures are pretty blurry
customer_reviews.text: So far it looks like the pictures are pretty blurry. I haven't taken too many outside yet so I am seeing if that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Harward

customer_reviews.title: The screen had a shadow over it making it virtually useless to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from Amazon. Used it a few months later. The screen had a shadow over it making it virtually useless to use. Don't know what to do with it now as it will cost almost the same amount of money to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But after a while It feels nice to use this camera and I can operate it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera mainly for a roadtrip, on which I didn't want to take my bulky DSLR. Of course it can't compete with my Nikons image quality or ease of use and I had to get used to shoot without a viewfinder again (Olympus offers some viewfinders to attach to the hot shoe though). But after a while It feels nice to use this camera and I can operate it fast enough. Pros: -manual focus -screen is tiltable -charge with USB -good built quality Cons: -touchscreen isn't configurable (you can just turn the touchscreen feature on or off. Would be nice to be able to select some functions) -touchscreen is useless for anything but scrolling through pictures
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian Zeh

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've used this camera for several weeks and have taken about 200 images with it. This camera has exceeded my expectations for ease of use and image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ginett

customer_reviews.title: Great deal of  capability. Hate the USB cable.
customer_reviews.text: Got this a day before an extended vacation. No manual so lots of trial and error. Fold out viewfinder is great for candid and overhead shots. Screwy USB proprietary cable sucks. One more cable in my carry on. Does not come with memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Galoolie

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality if great.
customer_reviews.text: Lots to learn with it. Does things a little bit differently. Picture quality if great.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Nice features, but broke early in
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and feel and great features. Within five hours two intermittent problems appeared: barrel stopped retracting properly when camera turned off, and camera would not focus. Then the barrel got stuck. Disconcerting in a brand new item. I have returned it for a refund. I would be tempted to try another, hoping that this was a lemon. Will wait to see what others have experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Crowell

customer_reviews.title: I thought I would love it - but
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would love it - but, my son tried to teach me how to use it - but, it was impossible - great camera and were I to have been able to use it, it would have been five stars. Annie xo I returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Anne K. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera for my daughter's 21 first birthday, needless to say she is grooving with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Dcrusoe

customer_reviews.title: I like the camera and it takes great pix
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera and it takes great pix. However, I certainly would advise it's purchase since the manual is HORRID. The help center is just as bad, since the rep. English was poor and when I asked for another rep, she hung up.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: I love my XZ -2 Olympus!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Olympus XZ-2 after a comparison between others compact cameras.It is an excellent camera with sharp lens (f 1.8) and excellent color. The build quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrizia Valeria Ugenti

customer_reviews.title: Olympus XZ-2
customer_reviews.text: Terrific camera. Purchased this as an addition to my dSLR equipment for situations regarding child portraits. Technical needs: RAW capture, high ISO low light image quality, tilting LCD, f1.8 max aperture, manual controls, rapid continuous shooting. After a month of use, this camera exceeds my expectations. The touch screen capability comes in very handy when you need to get down low for the image. The Fn buttons and control ring make changing settings a snap.
customer_reviews.author: RB from NOLA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Returned twice and finally gave up and got a Sony from Ebay
customer_reviews.author: CC Estimator

customer_reviews.title: Not a great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a great camera for the money. Really good in decent light, pretty horrible in low light. Actually ended up sending mine back after it was giving a lens error.
customer_reviews.author: Luxowell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Camera...Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked until yesterday...exactly one day after the return/exchange period. Now it won't even charge or turn on, and I have used it once. Horrible camera and waste of $$$ DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: Stangviperred

customer_reviews.title: so good. Easy to understand and use
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Easy to understand and use. Would've liked to have everything included, had to buy a memory card separately. Not a huge expense just inconvenient. Have only used it a few times, but seem to be losing the pictures even with the memory card in, I'm sure it's operator error, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Renee' E.

customer_reviews.title: Was a good camera. accidently slipped off my lap about 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a good camera. accidently slipped off my lap about 6 inches onto sand. Sand got into lens. Camera is now trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many cameras and this was is so easy to use. I am enjoying it, so far, with a lot of plans for great shots, this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Bettye Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: So the camera is essentialy useless.
customer_reviews.text: Viewer screen quick working for no reason. There is no viewfinder. So the camera is essentialy useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Penobscott

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Easy to use and still have much to learn. My piçtures have turned out great...The colors are so sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just expected more for the price; I think my Iphone takes better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: KSE Uri

customer_reviews.title: No lens cap?  Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and was horrified to see that the camera does NOT come with a lens cap. I'll say this again - this $500+ camera DOES NOT come with a lens cap. No problem, you can get the LC-63A automatic lens cap for $50+. What's wrong with this picture? You have to be kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for shooting dynamic objects in the AUTO mode ...
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for shooting dynamic objects in the AUTO mode. Automation is constantly setting a slower shutter speed and low ISO. Autofocus is slow. Well suited for shooting of static objects. Sold via eBay.
customer_reviews.author: Tural Muradbeyli

customer_reviews.title: Returned on the same day
customer_reviews.text: After using it for an hour in order to try it out, I have to return it immediately. The picture quality is bad. They are not sharp and noisy even at ISO 100. It is even much worse than my 6 year old Canon SD 800. I can not understand why it such a good review on every photo web site. May be just my bad lucky of having a lemon?? The unit is fully functional. Just with awful result.
customer_reviews.author: Frog in Well

customer_reviews.title: camera box
customer_reviews.text: the box of the camera was a bit broken inside... the rest was fine. is a good camera . thanks
customer_reviews.author: alejandro calderon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My wife Iphone 6 takes better low light photos consistently. The ZX photos are hit and miss.
customer_reviews.author: William Nix

customer_reviews.title: I don't know about the XZ-2. Amazon never delivered it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an Olympus XZ-2. Amazon delivered a pair of headphones i9n advance. Since I needed the camera before a trip I called and asked them to deliver another one the next day. They were all full of "I'm sorry for the mixup" but somehow, this company that can deliver items all over the world within 24 hours couldn't deliver another XZ-2 to me the next day. So, how is the XZ-2? I don't know. I'm sure its a great camera. Amazon on the other hand leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Caimi

product_meta.title: Olympus XZ-2 Digital Camera (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Style:BaseAt first glance, The Olympus XZ-2's most appealing feature might just be its 4x optical zoom lens. With a maximum aperture range of F1.8-2.5 it remains bright throughout the zoom range, reducing the need to boost ISO in low light situations. The XZ-2 is also equipped with a 12MP BSI CMOS sensor capable of full 1080p HD video and 5 frames per second burst shooting. A tilting 3.0 inch LCD is provided, as is compatible with Olympus' optional electronic viewfinder. Unlike its predecessor, the XZ-2 offers a sizable front hand grip that can be removed to make the camera pocket-friendlier.
feature_bullets: Super fast, bright i.ZUIKO f1.8 to f2.5 lens that uses high quality ZUIKO digital lenses
Pairs a powerful TruePic VI sensor with an SLR-quality image processor to dramatically improve image quality with spectacular low-light performance and blazing autofocus speed.
3.0", 920K dot super high resolution Tilting Touch screen with FAST Touch Autofocus and shutter release just by touching the screen
Built in Accessory Port, Hybrid Control Ring and Function button and level for ultimate control
Special effects for your photos & HD Videos with Olympus' 11 in-camera Art Filters and Art Effects
Enjoy low light photography with the built-in pop up flash and increased ISO sensitivity to 12800

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars154 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
